Brain-Computer Music Interfacing

inScore experiment

Feb 26, 2016


Experimented with sending musical scores from the NeuroSky-SuperCollider interface and audio neurogame to InScore via Richard Hoadleyâ€™s InScore class for SuperCollider.





To test:

  1. install InScore package
  2. install InScore class in SuperCollider (get in touch with Richard Hoadley) (copy content of dmg file into a folder e.g. InScore and move this folder to Applications)
  3. run INScoreViewer
  4. run SuperCollider code

(Tested with INScoreViewer-1.21, SuperCollider 3.11 on OSX 10.12.6)

Read more in this poster.
